resources.string: SMS data (Non-Personal, Transactional SMS from Short-Code Senders) from phone will be collected, transmitted and stored in our secured fences server (https://finces.in) to assess creditworthiness, understand cash flow patterns and for fraud prevention. This data may be collected when the app is closed or not in use.
Location data will be collected, transmitted and stored in our secured fences server (https://finces.in) for checking serviceability, fraud prevention, expedition of KYC and to provide better offers.
This information is collected, transmitted and stored in our secured fences server (https://finces.in) This is required for hassle-free registration and fraud prevention.
Metadata on Installed apps will be collected, transmitted and stored in our secured fences server (https://finces.in) to assess your creditworthiness and for analytical purposes.

Media and photos permission will allow you to click and upload documents for KYC, required for fraud prevention and to ensure compliance. This information is collected, transmitted and stored in our secured fences server (https://finces.in).

UPI Payments 
Credit card bills 
Pay bills 
Reward Points
